FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL MasterConfigurationCOM EXTENDS
MasterConfiguration
IMPLEMENTS IMasterConfigurationCOM
Function block representing an Master COM configuration.
A Master needs to be configured regarding its
master address
either IP- or COM-settings
